lead_paragraph: KASSIN--Selma. The Yeshiva University family is saddened by the passing of Selma Kassin, Z"l, a respected member of the New York Syrian Sephardic community. Mrs. Kassin was the beloved mother of Esther (and Robert J.) Ades, Pearl Beda, Jack Kassin and Leon Kassin, and the adored grandmother and great- grandmother of many. Esther and Robert J. Ades are major supporters of Yeshiva University's Sephardic Studies and Sephardic Community Programs. May they and all the members of the Ades and Kassin families be comforted among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Min hashamayim tenuhamu! Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
